data.eml:eml: Catalogue of families and their type genera in the mite suborder Uropodina (Acari: Mesostigmata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Halliday, R. B. (2016): Catalogue of families and their type genera in the mite suborder Uropodina (Acari: Mesostigmata). Zootaxa 4061 (4): 347-366, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.4.2
